GSP30utipk_au:774: Ipv: te vibhinnāvabhāsāḥ sāmānyātmano 'rthās tadanubhavasaṃskṛtaiḥ kṛśo 'haṃ duḥkhī sukhī vāham iti vicitravyapadeśaviṣayīkriyamāṇātmabhiḥ kṣetrajñair vikalpanaśaktyā tattadghaṭarajataśuklapaṭaśakaṭādināmnāntaspratyavamarśanīyatvena pradarśyante smṛtau pūrvānubhavāpramoṣe, vicitrotprekṣādiṣu tu svātantryeṇa /
GSP30utipk_au:775: ayam eva grāhyagrāhakabhedāvabhāsaḥ śabdamayaḥ paśubhāve saṃsārabandhaḥ //
GSP30utipk_au:780: Ipv: kṣetraś ceśvararūpa eva tattatsāmānyarūpānarthān īśaśaktyaivāparijñātayā sarvasādhāraṇārthadarśanasaṃskṛtānanyavedyān
GSP30utipk_au:782: sā ceśvaraśāktiḥ svātmamātraviśrāntivirodhāya māyāvyapadeśyā tattatkakārādivarṇabhedaśatānantagaṇanā prāṇarūpeṇa cañcalatām āpannā vikalpākhyavyāpārā tathāntaḥ sṛjaty arthān //
GSP30utipk_au:785: Ipv: īśvarasya tu sṛṣṭiḥ sarvapramātṝṇāṃ sādhāraṇī teṣāṃ tanmadhya
GSP30utipk_au:787: sā cāham idam ity etāvat parāmarśamayī bhedānudayād vikalpojjhitā spaṣṭāvabhāsā ca /
GSP30utipk_au:791: Ipv: kṣetrajñasyāpīśvaraśāktyaiva vikalpārambha iti taddaśāyām api parijñāteśvarabhāvasya mamāyaṃ saṃsāramayo vibhava ity abhedena viśvam āviśataḥ parāmarśamātrān aśeṣān vikalpān saṃpādayato maheśvarataiva //
GSP30utipk_au:793: maheśvaro yathā baddhaḥ % puna atyantabhedavat // Ipk_4.13 //
GSP30utipk_au:794: Ipv: baddhamuktayor vedyam ekaṃ, kiṃ tu baddho 'tyantavibhedena tad vetti vimuktaḥ svātmadehatvena
GSP30utipk_au:797: Ipv: sarvathā tv antarlīne prameye 'haṃmatau pūrṇāyāṃ śivataiva //
GSP30utipk_au:799: jānan yathepsitān paśyañ % jānāti ca karoti ca // Ipk_4.15 //
GSP30utipk_au:800: Ipv: ittham āviṣkṛtaśaktyabhijñānam ātmānam anantajñānakriyāśaktinibhṛtam īśvaraṃ pratyabhijñāya yathecchaṃ sarvaṃ paśyati nirmimīte //
GSP30utipk_au:801: iti prakaṭito mayā sughaṭa eṣa mārgo navo $ mahāgurubhir ucyate sma
GSP30utipk_au:803: tad atra nidadhat padaṃ bhuvanakartṛtām ātmano % vibhāvya śivatāmayīm aniśam āviśan siddhyati Ipv: yatra yathāvasthita eva vyavahāre pratyabhijñāmātrāc chivatālābhaḥ /
GSP30utipk_au:804: sa ayam avakra evābhinavo mārgaḥ sākṣātkṛtaparameśvarabhaṭṭārakākārair bhaṭṭaśrīsomānandapādaiḥ śivadṛṣṭināmni prakaraṇe nirdiṣṭo mayā yuktinibandhanena hṛdayaṃgamīkṛtaḥ /
GSP30utipk_au:805: etat pariśīlanena śivatāveśāj jīvann eva mukto bhavati //
GSP30utipk_au:806: tais tair apy upayācitair upanatas tanvyāḥ sthito 'py antike $ kānto lokasamāna evam aparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā &
GSP30utipk_au:807: lokasyaiṣa tathānavekṣitaguṇaḥ svātmāpi viśveśvaro % naivālaṃ nijavaibhavāya tad iyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā Ipv: kāntadṛṣṭānteneśvarapratyabhijñopapādanīyā cāpūrvaphalā ca //
